description: YouTube Live Chat reaction spam - 0102 party mode!

toggle_popup.description: Heart button - hover to open popup

flow: 1. Hover at toggle (359, 759) to open popup
2. Wait 0.15-0.3s for popup to slide up
5. Repeat - re-hover toggle every 3 clicks to keep popup open
notes: Coordinates are relative to chat iframe
Mouse events: mousemove, mouseenter, mouseover, then click
Popup may close after clicks - re-hover to reopen
